common_behaviors_actions: Leading her clan with wisdom and strength.
Using her druidic powers to manipulate the earth and protect her people.
Engaging in combat with both physical attacks and powerful spells.
Thane Kayalithica.name: Thane Kayalithica
Thane Kayalithica.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
special_abilities: Stone Camouflage: Thane Kayalithica has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
Rock Catching: If a rock or similar object is hurled at Thane Kayalithica, she can, with a successful Dexterity saving throw, catch it and take no damage.

Earthquake (Recharge 5-6): Thane Kayalithica causes a localized earthquake. All creatures within a 30-foot radius must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone and take 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. The area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute.

legendary_actions.Detect: Thane Kayalithica makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.Move: Thane Kayalithica moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
legendary_actions.Stone Shaping (Costs 2 Actions): Thane Kayalithica shapes a 10-foot cube of stone within 60 feet into any form she desires. This change lasts for 1 hour.

actions: Multiattack: Thane Kayalithica makes two attacks with her Greatclub.
Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

common_behaviors_actions: Leading his fire giant kin with an iron fist and ruthless tactics.
Utilizing his strategic mind to outmaneuver his enemies in combat.
Wielding massive weapons with expert proficiency and deadly precision.
King Snurre Ironbelly.name: King Snurre Ironbelly
special_abilities: Fire Aura: King Snurre radiates intense heat. Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of him takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.
Ruthless Strike: King Snurre can add his proficiency bonus to damage rolls with melee weapons.

legendary_actions.Detect: King Snurre makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.Move: King Snurre moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
legendary_actions.Ignite Weapon (Costs 2 Actions): King Snurre sets a weapon he wields aflame, causing it to deal an extra 14 (4d6) fire damage on a hit for 1 minute.

actions: Multiattack: King Snurre makes three attacks with his Flaming Greatsword.
Flaming Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.
Throwing Hammer: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
bonus_actions: Rage (4 uses/day): King Snurre can enter a rage as a bonus action, gaining resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and adding bonus damage to his melee attacks.
reactions: Parry: King Snurre adds 4 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, King Snurre must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
